dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2938 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Wheatfield, New York.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Wheatfield, New York.

section.header: Single, unique ZIP Code for Wheatfield, New York
section.text: Not later than 270 days after the enactment of this section, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing solely Wheatfield, New York.
